code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import'./Home.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{useEffect(()=>{const texts=["developer","coder","winner"];let count=0;let index=0;let currentText='';let letter='';function type(){if(count===texts.length){count=0;}currentText=texts[count];letter=currentText.slice(0,++index);const dynamicText=document.getElementById('dynamic-text');if(dynamicText){dynamicText.innerHTML="").concat(letter,"");if(letter.length===currentText.length){count++;index=0;setTimeout(type,3000);}else{setTimeout(type,300);}}}type();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"home",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"home-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Hey! ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"themeText",children:"I'm"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"name",children:"Jhavakar Thillainathan"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"description",children:["I'm a ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{id:"dynamic-text"}),", passionate and experienced in building Web and Mobile Applications."]})]})})});};export default Home;
